org.protune.core
Interface Status

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProtuneFilterEngine
public interface Status

The interface Status represents the state of a negotiation. A state should contain (at least)

  • sent/received FilteredPolicy
  • Notification of performed actions
  • Check testing whether the notifications are (not) reliable
The interface Status does not provide methods directly allowing the addition of such entities to the state, since they are meant to be wrapped by a NegotiationElement object, therefore only the method addNegotiationElement(NegotiationElement) was provided.

Author:
jldecoi
